mapper.select:
select sm.material_id, sm.material_code, sm.material_name, sm.material_desc, sm.unit,sm.version, sm.product_model_id, spm.product_model_code as productModelCode, bpf.product_family_id,bpf.product_family_code, bpf.product_family_name, bpf.product_family_desc, sm.material_type,sm.material_source, sm.barcode_rule_id,sm.if_compoboard,sm.if_linking_board, sm.linking_board_number,sm.takt,sm.transfer_quantity,sm.status, sm.customer_material_code, sm.min_package_number, sm.create_user_id, u.user_name as createUserName,sm.create_time, sm.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, sm.modified_time, sm.is_delete from fantech_imes.smt_material sm left join ocean.sys_user u on sm.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on sm.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_product_model spm on sm.product_model_id=spm.product_model_id left join fantech_imes.base_product_family bpf on spm.product_family_id = bpf.product_family_id
1=1
and date_format(sm.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and sm.material_code =#{materialCode}
and sm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and sm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and sm.material_desc like CONCAT('%', #{materialDesc}, '%')
and sm.material_id!=(select material_id from fantech_imes.smt_product_bom where product_bom_id=#{productBomId})
and sm.material_id!=(select material_id from fantech_imes.smt_work_order where work_order_id=#{workOrderId})
and sm.status=#{status}
order by sm.create_time desc
